Carlos Gomez.description: conversing about Ayesha Khan expressing interest in Carlos Gomez's participation in a creative writing workshop and trying to engage in a discussion about their shared interest, but meeting resistance from Carlos who rebuffs her attempt to connect. @ <persona> Ayesha Khan
chat: Hey Carlos! I noticed you were attending a creative writing workshop. How was it? Did you learn anything interesting?
Why are you so interested in what I'm doing? Mind your own business.
I apologize if I seemed intrusive. I just thought we share an interest in creative writing and could potentially learn from each other's experiences.
I don't need your advice or input on my writing. Just leave me alone.
